data.feedback: Well-structured platform configuration epic with correct modern APIs (Health Connect), complete permission coverage, and excellent developer guidance. Minor epic-level path inconsistency doesn't block implementation.

issues.description: Epic filesToCreate path for MainActivity differs from actual package structure
issues.recommendation: Update path to com/example/pasos/app_pasos_frontend/ - non-blocking since Story 3 has correct path

suggestions: Consider updating epic-level filesToCreate to match actual package structure
MainActivity should be in filesToModify at epic level (already exists)
